name: SeeSay
0:
”Alexa, Play See Say”
”Alexa, Start See Say.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: see say
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The children's classic toy See and Say is now available in Skill form. This Skill offers 24 animal sounds and over 350 fun animal facts within the companion app to continue the learning or just ask for a random fact. This Skill has been updated to use Alexa Presentation Language (APL) to give the user easier access to all of the animals on one screen. This skill also offers in-Skill purchasing which will give the user access to an additional 14 animals and any future animals or features added to the Skill.

You can request a new animal by leaving us a review.

The animals featured in this Skill include:
Alligator
Bear
Bubble Bee
Bison
Cat
Cow
Deer
Dog
Elephant
Frog
Goat
Guinea Pig
Horse
Lion
Monkey
Parrot
Penguin
Pig
Rabbit 
Sea Lion
Sheep
Toucan
Turkey
Whale

**with mystery animals to be unlocked**
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
